import React from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{ToastContainer,toast}from'react-toastify';import'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css';import cookies from'js-cookie';import HomePage from'./HomePage.jsx';import SignupPage from'./SignupPage.jsx';import'./LoginPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const[EmailId,setEmail]=useState('');const[Password,setPass]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();axios.post('http://localhost:3001/login',{EmailId,Password}).then(result=>{if(result.data==='LoginFail'){alert("Invalid EmailId/Password");}else if(result.data==='Notexist'){alert("Email does not Exists");}else{cookies.set('email',EmailId);// alert("Login Successfully");
navigate("/private/HomePage");}}).catch(error=>console.log(error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"body_div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"div_form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"heading",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login to IRCTC"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{method:"POST",id:"LoginForm",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputGrp",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Email ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"abc@gmail.com",name:"EmailId",value:EmailId,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputGrp",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"Password",placeholder:"Password",name:"Password",value:Password,onChange:e=>setPass(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"inputGrp",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"submit",type:"submit",children:"Login"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputGrp",children:["Don't have account?",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"SignupPage",id:"page_link",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Register"})]})]})]})]})});};export default LoginPage;
